Passaic.Little Ferry Seaplane Base:
Little Ferry Seaplane Base (FAA LID: 2N7) is a public-use seaplane base located one nautical mile (1.852 km) east of the central business district of the borough of Little Ferry on the Hackensack River in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States. The base is privately owned.


== Facilities and aircraft ==
Little Ferry Seaplane Base covers an area of 1 acre (0.40 ha) at an elevation of 0 feet (0 m) above mean sea level.
